Niche Content Curation
Drugmakers Increasingly Use Data Mining for Targeted Ads
articles.Description: Drugmakers are increasingly using a data-mining method, called "matchback," to tailor Web advertisements to patients based on their prescription drug data. While drugmakers say the practice complies with HIPAA, the technique is raising privacy concerns among certain industry stakeholders. Bloomberg.
